duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outreach, technical assistance, and training for nonprofit loan packagers in the USDA 502 Direct Loan Application Packaging program.
Ensure compliance with programmatic and administrative regulations, and electronically submit 502 files to USDA RD website.
Produce high-quality loan packages and maintain compliance by RCAC and Qualified Employers as defined in signed Memorandum of Understandings.
Work closely with lending partners and agencies to facilitate partnerships and maximize resources.
Prepare activity and outcome reports as required, and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Housing Development, Mortgage Lending, or related field (Master's preferred)
